title: Erianthinae
text:
The Erianthinae are a subfamily of Asian <a href="grasshopper">grasshopper</a>s in the family <a href="Chorotypidae">Chorotypidae</a> and based on the type genus "<a href="Erianthus%20%28insect%29">Erianthus</a>". There are currently 12 genera and more than 40 described species recorded from southern China, Japan, <a href="Indo-China">Indo-China</a> and <a href="Malesia">Malesia</a>.
Genera.
These 12 genera belong to the subfamily Erianthinae:
